issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

fields.description:
Hi, I made a background running application for iphone using titanium location services and it is working fine. But the problem is if I turn off the iphone and turn it on again the location service is no more running. I need to open the application upon every restart of iphone to make the application to start run in background again.

Please, its urgent!
fields.summary: Location service stops after the iphone restarts - HELP!

comments.body:
Hi Andres,

This is native behavior of the iOS platform, you can't change the fact that apps need to be re-opened to re-initiate services on restart.

Closing as invalid.
